metaDescription.content: Semrush Content Marketing Platform covers the entire content marketing workflow, providing tools to create, manage, track, and analyze your content performance.

h2s.text: Create Content that Drives Results  with Semrush Content Marketing Tools
h2s.html:
Create Content that Drives Results
with Semrush Content Marketing Tools

h3s.html: Content Creation and Distribution Tools

content.html:
1. Features

  2. Content Marketing Tools

Content Marketing Tools

Create and execute a powerful data-informed content strategy based on your audience's needs. Combine creativity and analytics on each step of your workflow, from ideation to creation, optimization and measurement

Start for Free

  • Topic Research

    Discover dozens of content ideas to create engaging content that resonates with your audience. Find popular topics, headlines, and questions asked online to draw up a successful traffic-driving editorial plan.

    Start for Free Learn more

  • SEO Content Template

    Generate a custom brief for SEO-friendly content in a few clicks that will drive organic traffic to your website. Get actionable recommendations based on your top 10 rivals in Google that target your keywords.

    Start for Free Learn more

  • SEO Writing Assistant

    Check your SEO score and originality, improve your readability, and adjust the tone of voice to write an exceptional piece of content. Get actionable tips in your Google Docs or WordPress account on the go.

    Start for Free Learn more

  • ContentShake AI

    Create unlimited SEO-friendly articles and boost organic traffic with ease. Get weekly content ideas, generate optimized content, add AI images, and post directly to your WordPress site.

    Start for Free
1 / 2
  • I use Topic Research almost every day when searching for ideas and validating campaign topics that I would like to focus on.
    Hana Bednarova
    Founder of Bednar Comms, Digital PR Specialist
  • Semrush’s SEO Content Template and SEO Writing Assistant are great, practical tools for helping to focus content creation efforts on things that are more likely to deliver higher expected value.
    Andrew Bruce Smith
    PR, Social Media, SEO & Analytics Consultant

Create Content that Drives Results
with Semrush Content Marketing Tools

Start for Free

Related Features

Combine creativity and analytics on each step of your workflow using Semrush

  • Content Creation and Distribution Tools

    Create and share optimized articles that resonate with your audience.

    Learn more
    3 tools

  • Content Optimization Tools

    Get tips on optimizing your content to drive more organic traffic.

    Learn more
    3 tools

Features 

Content Marketing Tools

Content Marketing Tools

Create and execute a powerful data-informed content strategy based on your audience's needs. Combine creativity and analytics on each step of your workflow, from ideation to creation, optimization and measurement

Start for Free
Topic Research

Discover dozens of content ideas to create engaging content that resonates with your audience. Find popular topics, headlines, and questions asked online to draw up a successful traffic-driving editorial plan.

Start for Free
Learn more
SEO Content Template

Generate a custom brief for SEO-friendly content in a few clicks that will drive organic traffic to your website. Get actionable recommendations based on your top 10 rivals in Google that target your keywords.

Start for Free
Learn more
SEO Writing Assistant

Check your SEO score and originality, improve your readability, and adjust the tone of voice to write an exceptional piece of content. Get actionable tips in your Google Docs or WordPress account on the go.

Start for Free
